QuestData.Title: To Stonehearth's Aid
QuestData.Description: The earthen and the stone troggs somehow found their way to Deepholm through Uldum more than fifteen thousand years ago. They've been warring ever since.$B$BIf we're to recover the middle fragment of the World Pillar, the Stonefather must be rescued.$B$BPlease go to Stonehearth and do everything that you can to aid the Earthen in their war against the stone troggs.$B$BYou're our best hope, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Crag Rockcrusher at Stonehearth in Deepholm.
QuestData.RewardText: The Stonefather's son, Flint, sent you? No time to talk.$B$BWe must prevent a second front from opening up on the war!
